c74object.name: orchidea.features
c74object.digest: Extract average descriptors from audio files
c74object.description: Analyzes the input audio files and outputs their basic average features (centroid, spread, skewness and kurtosis).

inlet.digest: Name of file or files to be analyzed

outlet.description: For each argument, an outlet is created that will outpu the feature described by that argument.

objarg.name: features
objarg.description: The names of the features to retrieve. For each of the feature, a dedicated outlet is created that will output it. Features can be one of the following symbols: "centroid", "spread", "skewness", "kurtosis".

method.name: bang
method.description: When a bang is received, the features are recomputed on the last input files.

method.name: symbol/list
method.description: A symbol or a list in the left inlet sets the name or path of the file or files on which the features should be computed, triggers the computation and outputs the result. Each feature is output through its corresponding outlet.

attribute.name: hopsize
attribute.description: Sets the hop size of the analysis.

attribute.name: parallel
attribute.description:
When this attribute is 1, the computations are performed in a separate thread.
This is beyond the edge of legality in Max, so use this at your own risk: for instance, don't modify the object or close the patch while running, because this will more than likely cause crashes.

attribute.name: windowsize
attribute.description: Sets the size of the analysis window.

c74object.discussion: This object can be used to analyse a single audio file to compute basic average features. Audio files must be sampled at 44100 Hz, 16 bit.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (symbol)
entry.description: Name of file or files to be analyzed.
